attributes.action: Call a general election to decide new leader
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have always looked at my country as a bastion of democracy. That has certainly changed under new labour. The people of this nation are being treated with utter contempt and their opinions ignored. There should be a general election for the people to decide who the next prime minister will be. Tony Blair be honest with us all just this once. We are not as stupid as you think we are and are more than capable of making a democratic choice. Let the peoples voice be heard.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
